column5: Anyone who needs Worms, Leeches or Minnows going to Armstrong Call Silver Minnow Bait on HWY 527 at 807-632-6572 ask for Josh he will try to take care of all your needs. Note leeches may be harder to get at this time Larry S

yup just stop off the highway before you get moving and thier little shop has lots.. the fish are so hungry this year you'll be fine without worms IMO.. my buddy and I made it up north and we did over 600 fish in 1 week just spoons, jigs, raps kinda thing..
